enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Prerequisite: Students must have passed HIND_URD 211-1, 2 and 3 with a minimum grade C- or equivalent.
title: WCAS HIND_URD 310-0-20 Hindi-Urdu IV: Topics in Advanced Hindi-Urdu

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: In this course, we will read stories of magic, mystery, miracles, and marvels. Readings will come from the dastan and qissa traditions - sometimes called romances, epics, or adventure stories - as well as from their modern descendants, science fiction and thrillers. Our emphasis will be on reading and writing in Urdu and Hindi, but there will also be substantial speaking and listening components.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: C- or better in three quarters of Hindi-Urdu 211 or equivalent, or by placement test or with instructor consent.
